title: following provisions of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement) 

(No. 5) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic act 2024 (commencement) (no 5) order 2024

title: following provisions of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come
heading: 2. The 7th day of February 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 7th day of February 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) shall come 
into operation: 

(a) 

paragraphs (a) and (b) of section 5, 

(b) 

section 7, and 

(c) 

paragraph (c) of section 10. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

6 November, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [616] 3
